description.p:
The Mariner 9 SCLK works for most Mariner 9 labels. However images on the end of a time partition attempt to interpolate with the next time partition, leading to strange time codes. These time codes cause failures when looking up the CKs and SPKs.
mar9fixspice embeds the InstrumentPointing and InstrumentPosition directly in the cube, preventing the need for any sort of lookup.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: The input Mariner 9 image file must be linearized (16-bit), and not geometrically transformed. If the file extension is omitted, then ".cub" will be assumed.
